RADIUS.description: The base type for resources and members that can be linked to.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RadiusServerIP.description: The IP address of the RADIUS server.
RadiusServerIP.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of IP address.

RadiusServer.longDescription: The value of this property shall be match the format of FQDN.

RadiusSecret.description: A (secret) password for the user to access the Radius server.
RadiusSecret.longDescription: The value of this property shall not contain special characteristics and its max length is 32.

RadiusEnabled.longDescription: If RADIUS is enabled, a centralized authentication, authorization and accounting management for users is provided

RadiusPortNumber.description: The port number for RADIUS server.
RadiusPortNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be in the range between 1~65535.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

title: #RADIUS.v1_0_2.RADIUS
